Articles.Content: Hi bumped into this game while browsing youtube in the early hours as you do... and i dont think i have stopped since. lots of fun and i love the modding community. mecjeb is a great tool im using to help me learn the basics as i learn i stop using that function on it. *getting into orbit without crashing is a good example* though i still quite often end up going boom. really enjoying the game though cant wait for specific missions built into the game

Welcome to the community Bigant

Don't worry about using MechJeb, it's able to do things that just can't be done by hand, but it is a good idea and a lot of fun to learn to fly manually

Have fun on the forums and fly safe!
